com.yolanda.nohttp.download

接口 DownloadListener


  • public interface DownloadListener

    The download process monitor.

    Created in Jul 31, 2015 9:12:55 AM;
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onCancel(int what)
      Download request is canceled.
      void onDownloadError(int what, Exception exception)
      An error occurred while downloading.
      void onFinish(int what, String filePath)
      Download is complete.
      void onProgress(int what, int progress, long fileCount)
      When the download process change.
      void onStart(int what, boolean isResume, long rangeSize, Headers responseHeaders, long allCount)
      When this download task starts the callback method.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onDownloadError

        void onDownloadError(int what,
                     Exception exception)
        An error occurred while downloading.
        参数:
        what - which is used to mark the download tasks.
        exception - error types. Error types include the following:

        ArgumentError Need to check the download parameters are correct.

        NetworkError The network is not available, please check the network.

        ServerError When the response code is more than 400, you need to look at the response code specific how much is the judgement is something wrong.

        StorageReadWriteError An error occurred when read/write memory CARDS, please check the memory card.

        StorageSpaceNotEnoughError There is insufficient space on the memory card, please check the memory card.

        TimeoutError Timeout connecting to the server or read the file.

        UnKnownHostError Is not found in the network of the target server.

        URLError Download url is wrong.

      • onStart

        void onStart(int what,
             boolean isResume,
             long rangeSize,
             Headers responseHeaders,
             long allCount)
        When this download task starts the callback method.
        参数:
        what - which is used to mark the download tasks.
        isResume - whether to continue to download, if it is true that has download before, and have already. download the file size is not zero.
        rangeSize - hTTP starting point size, the size of the data already exists.
        responseHeaders - server response headers.
        allCount - total file size.

      • onProgress

        void onProgress(int what,
                int progress,
                long fileCount)
        When the download process change.
        参数:
        what - which is used to mark the download tasks.
        progress - this method is the time to change the progress of the download.
        fileCount - have downloaded the file size.

      • onFinish

        void onFinish(int what,
              String filePath)
        Download is complete.
        参数:
        what - which is used to mark the download tasks.
        filePath - where is the file after the download is complete.

      • onCancel

        void onCancel(int what)
        Download request is canceled.
        参数:
        what - which is used to mark the download tasks.
